title: Agent of Vengeance
description: NSA agent Ronald Fletcher's life is turned upside down after a terrorist attack on a beach in Israel, and he won't stop until he brings those responsible to justice. But is he prepared to face the dark secrets he'll uncover?- The ultraviolent terrorist group known as "the Plague"- An underground Nazi city, birthplace of the Fourth Reich- Mysterious cylinders containing the ultimate weapon of mass destruction- The world's most notorious assassin, stalking his every moveIn this international game of intrigue, the stakes are high, the gloves are off, and all the players have the same motivation: cold, hard vengeance.
author: Scott M. Neuman
